import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import './CreateForm.css' const CreateForm = () => { const [subject, setSubject] = useState(''); const [className, setClassName] = useState(''); const [totalMarks, setTotalMarks] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here if(subject==null || className==null|| totalMarks==null){ window.location.replace('/createform') } window.location.replace('/testinput') }; return (
); } export default CreateForm
